title: Mike Eats an Egg FOR THE FIRST TIME! - The Spare Bedroom Launch Stream
description:
Watch The Rings of Power on Prime Video and download the Amazon Music app to listen to all eight episodes of The Official The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power Podcast for free on Amazon Music.

Go to http://policygenius.com to get your free life insurance quotes and see how much you could save.

I swear on my life, Mike Howard has never eaten an egg before. This is his real reaction to eating one for the first time. EGG!

Time Stamps - 
0:00:00 - Start
0:12:37 - Ads
0:14:33 - Egg continues
